summary: The diff only updates `project_state.json` metadata and does not implement any UI/code changes to connect the “Play Now” button to the SA-MP server. It also introduces several landing-page feature definitions that were not requested in the BuildRequest (which lists no requirements).

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement a “Play Now” button that connects to the SA-MP server using the exact URL `samp://15.235.185.4:7785`.
missing_requirements.reason: No frontend/UI source files were modified; only `project_state.json` was updated, so the button behavior cannot have been implemented.

hallucinated_features.description: Planned/defined work to build a responsive single-page “Next Level RP” landing page with header, CTA row, and feature cards (Server Status, Custom Skins & Vehicles), including themed styling and client-side status behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest specifies no requirements beyond ensuring the Play Now button connects to the given SA-MP URL and includes constraints/non-goals; the diff adds multiple unrequested feature entries (REQ-1..REQ-4) and new_feature_requests AR-1..AR-4 in project metadata.
